pages.text: Increases the level of cast spells by 1. Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_the_sojourn)Path of the Sojourn$(/l)$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_resonance)Path of Resonance$()

pages.mod_text: Your scepter has grown skilled at casting its spells. Imbued onto the Skillful Scepter and persists through the Path of the Sojourn or the Path of Resonance
